      • readMetadata

        Transceiver readMetadata(AssetIdentity id)
                         throws IOException
        Read the metadata of an asset. The output may contain multiple asset objects, one for each file associated with the asset.
        Parameters:
        id - the identity of the asset to read
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readFigureMetadata

        Transceiver readFigureMetadata(AssetIdentity id)
                               throws IOException
        Read the metadata of a figure asset. The output contains the figure metadata, as defined by the "original" asset file, plus the individual asset file objects.
        Parameters:
        id - the identity of the asset to read
        Throws:
        IOException
